column4: Restricts a purpose to the specified context(s)
Used to scope the purpose, e.g. restriction to a certain business sector
Indicates the purpose is associated with activities in the indicated (Economic) Sector(s)
Used to indicate the sector of a purpose e.g. Agriculture, Advertising (specified e.g. in the form of NACE codes)
Cui bono? Who is the ultimate beneficiary of this purpose, here a stakeholder can be declared, e.g. the DataSubjects themselves or the Data Controller. ( --- under consideration --- )
column10: If we want ot be able to say something about the beneficiary of a purpose, we probably also need to say something about how the beneficiary benefits? - whether it is good for the controller or data subject

column4: self.DataSubject, self.DataController, society ? ( --- under consideration ---)
